channel.title: About the NFTs category
channel.description:
## WARNING: Until Babylon is released, all you're buying is a token that you may or *may not* be able to swap for an NFT in the future. As always, do your own research! This category will be used as a showcase for NFTs on the Radix Ledger.
You can find a list with a small summary [here](https://radixtalk.com/t/list-of-nfts-on-radix-dlt/219/6), and you can get your own NFT added by following the instructions written [here.](https://radixtalk.com/t/how-to-get-your-nft-added-on-radixtalk/267/2)
Only moderators can create threads, but everyone can post and comment.
